content.rendered:
Directed by Nikkhil Advani.

Written by Anshul Singhal.

Cast Imran Khan(Madhav Kabra / Maddy). Kangana Ranaut(Payal). Abhishek Saha(Vinay). Suhaas Ahuja(Roger). Nikkitasha Marwaha(Tina). Shilpi Tiwari(Shweta). Nicole Faria(Devika). Bugs Bhargava Krishna(Ramalingam (as Bugs Bhargava)). Suparna Marwah(Madhav’s Mother). Suneel Sinha(Madhav’s Father) . Masood Akhtar(Varghese). Madhu Bharti(Mrs. Chaturvedi). Vivan Bhatena(Ricky). Paromita Chatterjee(Mrs. Ahuja (as Paromita Chaterjee)). Farida Dadi(Mrs. D’Silva). Nikhil Dave(VP Taneja). Ajay Jadhav(Watchman at Payal’s Residence (as Ajay Yadav)). Aadar Malik(Aniket (as Adaar Malik)). Gavin Methalaka(Yash (as Methalaka Gavin)). Jiten Mukhi(Mr. Ahuja (as Jiten Mookhey)). Mithila Palkar(Koyal). Jimesh Patel(Raghu). Chandan Raina(FOSLA Band member). Fam boy Sameer(Imran (credit only)). Anshul Singhal(Villager)

Language Hindi.

Producers Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Sachin Agarwal. Madhu Bhojwani. Siddharth Roy Kapur. Amrita Pandey. Rameshchandra Yadav.

Production Emmay Entertainment. Live Forever Productions(India). UTV Motion Pictures.
